name: Monthly Variance Analysis
description: Analyze actual financial results against budget and prior periods. Identify significant variances, investigate root causes, and prepare variance commentary for leadership. A foundational FP&A workflow performed every month-end close.

currentProcess.description: Extract actual results from accounting system/ERP
painPoints: Data not always closed on time

currentProcess.description: Align actuals to budget format and chart of accounts
painPoints: Budget and actuals use different account structures

currentProcess.description: Calculate variances ($ and %) for each line item
Investigate root causes for each material variance
painPoints: Need to contact multiple departments for explanations

currentProcess.description: Write variance commentary for each line item

painPoints: Different stakeholders want different detail levels

aiProcess.description: Extract and format data from sources
aiProcess.toolRationale: Gemini handles structured financial data well
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Aligned actual vs budget data in consistent format
tips: Export to CSV with clear column headers

aiProcess.description: Calculate variances and flag material items
aiProcess.toolRationale: Gemini performs calculations and applies threshold logic
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Variance table with flagged items above threshold

aiProcess.description: Generate variance hypotheses and investigation questions
aiProcess.toolRationale: Claude excels at generating logical hypotheses for financial variances
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Hypothesis list for each material variance with suggested data to confirm
tips: Ask about timing vs permanent variance likelihood

aiProcess.toolRationale: Human interaction needed; AI helped focus the questions
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Confirmed root causes for each variance

aiProcess.toolRationale: ChatGPT writes clear, concise financial commentary
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Draft commentary for each material variance

whyItMatters: Variance analysis is the foundation of financial accountability. It answers 'did we perform as expected?' and 'why or why not?' Fast, accurate variance analysis enables quicker course corrections and builds trust with leadership.
commonMistakes: Reporting variances without explaining business drivers
Treating all variances equally - prioritize by materiality and controllability
Ignoring offsetting variances that net to zero but hide issues
Writing 'due to higher costs' - explain WHY costs were higher
Not distinguishing timing differences from permanent variances
tips: Build a 'context log' throughout the month to capture events affecting financials
Use AI to generate hypotheses, then validate with business partners
Ask AI to draft commentary in multiple formats: detailed and summary
Create a template that you update monthly - consistency builds speed
